issue.title: [Rust] Start native Rust Implementation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2361](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2361). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I'm creating this Jira to track work to donate an work-in-progress native Rust implementation of Arrow.

I am actively developing this and relying on it for the memory model of my DataFusion project. I would like to donate the code I have now and start working on it under the Apache Arrow project.

Here is the PR: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1804

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2361?focusedCommentId=16421414) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1804
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1804>
